His work for clients such as 20th Century Fox, AMD, Apple, HP, Intel, PayPal, Universal Pictures, and many more has been recognized by numerous awards and publications including the EmmyÂ® Technical Excellence Award, Webby Award, FWA awards, KeyArts Awards, ADDY, Omni awards and Horizon Interactive awards. A proven thought-leader in the digital media industry, Ming speaks regularly at both local and international conferences in North America and Asia.
